document_data.name: Amon
document_data.aliases: Sorcerous Amon<ref group="note">In the original ''[[Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn]]'' his name was "Amon of the Purple Brotherhood".
document_data.alignment2e: [[Lawful evil]]<ref group="note">Similarly, his original alignment was [[true neutral]].
document_data.Relationships:
Among the other members of Amon's band was the [[dwarven]] warrior [[Mencar Pebblecrusher]], the [[thief]] [[Brennan Risling]], as well as the [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] [[Smaeluv Orcslicer]]. He appeared to barely tolerate the brutish half-orc.

Amon was also accompanied by his [[imp]] [[familiar]] [[Pooky]], who referred to him as "Papa".
document_data.Possessions: Among his possessions was a ''[[cloak of non-detection]]'' and a ''[[wand of lightning]]''.
document_data.History: At some point in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Amon and his group stayed at the [[Den of the Seven Vales]] in [[Athkatla]].
